title: Equipping family physicians to thrive: Scholarship as a core competency.

affiliations: Associate Professor and Research Director in the Department of Family Medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, NS.

authors.name: Douglas Archibald
affiliations: Director of Research and Innovation and Associate Professor in the Department of Family Medicine with cross-appointments to the Department of Innovation in Medical Education and the Faculty of Education at the University of Ottawa in Ontario.

affiliations: Associate Professor, Director of the Primary Healthcare Research Unit, and Acting Chair of Family Medicine at Memorial University in St John's, NL.

affiliations: Canada Research Chair in Addiction Medicine, and Professor and Research Director in the Department of Family and Emergency Medicine at Université de Montréal in Québec.

affiliations: Professor and Research Director in the Department of Family and Emergency Medicine at Université de Sherbrooke in Québec.
